definition[0]: the removal or destruction of something
example[0]: the elimination of lead in petrol
definition[1]: the defeat of a team or player in a competition, so that they may no longer take part
definition[2]: the act of killing someone, especially to prevent them from causing trouble
example[1]: The killings are part of a campaign of elimination of the political opposition.
definition[3]: the process of getting rid of substances that your body no longer needs
example[2]: the elimination of toxins from the body
